description: This file contains test functions for verifying the behavior of an agent system that interacts with various tools and models, specifically focusing on AWS Bedrock models and multiple tools like YFinanceTools, DuckDuckGoTools, and custom tools. The tests check tool invocation, streaming responses, multiple and parallel tool calls, and custom tool functions.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool invocation with YFinanceTools to get current stock price.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response and detection of tool call events.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls within a single response for different stocks.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tools (YFinanceTools and DuckDuckGoTools) invoked together.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with no parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests a tool that processes multiple URLs and returns related papers.
